gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsCurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_BalanceSheetHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_BalanceSheetHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
